bad-fortune.title: bad fortune
bad-fortune.lyrics: i'm happy to go where the algorithm takes us and get told off by vegan-baiting waitress i'll pick my bad fortune right from off of the ground it's worse than that without you i'm no prospect but i'm lonely when i'm with you do you think you'll talk me out of this and hold my head up high do you think i'll just snap out of it and hold my head up high now what comes next on the kitchen disco playlist? it's worse than that the hours drip and the coffee makes us weightless it's worse than that who's wrong, who's right? who cares at all? who's gonna be the last one standing in life's laundromat this is the sticky floor spinning and twirling to a cycle's final roar

guitars: epiphone les paul inspired by gibson goldtop
squier classic vibe bass vi black
guitar_amplifiers: 5 watt custom amp by leif bodnarachuk
bass: fender pj bass mim sb - seymour duncan quarter pounder pickups & badass bridge
keys: korg sv1 - hammond, clavinet & vox continental
drums: mapex black panther hand hammered aluminium snare 14x5.5

technical.recording_chain: audient asp8024 > m audio profire 2626 > pro tools
